i didnt expect it to be so big! and the quality is very nice for the price, worth every penny.

I love this purse, but the stitches looks busted. I don’t think those strings are supposed to be coming out
I LOVE this bag! It works great as a shoulder bag and a backpack. Lots of space. The skull zippers are really neat. I’m so happy I made this purchase!

I love the design of this purse! I LOVE skulls & black, but the pocket inside ripped after only a few weeks. I never even used the pocket that ripped! It just got caught on stuff I put inside such as my wallet or anything really. Created a big hole in there now... Very disappointing...

评论概述: It’s alright for what it is
评论详情: I really wanted this purse. Once I got it in the mail I didn’t realize how huge it was. I needed a bigger purse but not THAT big. The back zipper is annoying. It will zip but then when I go to open it, sometimes the pocket is open (as in the zipper cracks in the middle and opens), then I can’t unzip it all the way, goes more than halfway, but it gets stuck because it unzips when it should and not the teeth get stuck at a certain point. That is the only drawback of this purse, aside from the fact that it’s bigger than I expected 🤷🏼‍♀️. Overall it’s a decent purse.

I was pleasantly surprised by the quality of both the inside & out and the ability to turn into a backpack! I got the lovely skull interior and it definitely helps with finding things (boo dark linings!) Also and this was really the best part, it STAYS on the shoulder comfortably. I was overwhelmed at first as I didn't realize how big it was (my mistake not the companys) but it's become my favorite purse now, I adore it.
I am in love with this bag. The details alone are amazing and I love that I can carry everything I need for the day and not feel like it weights a ton
Real nice

The liner is cheap and basic black. I bet it won't last the week. Not the fabric shown. I have a purse 3+ years I was trying to replace with this that has the fabric shown and that fabric has not once torn or ripped. I know this will 100%. Otherwise the purse is exactly the quality of the purse it's replacing. Not satisfied at all.
Bigger than I expected very well made zippers work great. Love it.
I got tons of compliments on this purse ! I love it 🥰
Large and deep very nice
Cheeply made 😔

So, I took the risk of getting this bag even with reviews complaining about the construction of the bag or the bag people got not being as advertised. Honestly the bag is great, the size is frankly big enough that if it was empty my 20lb cat could ride in it. The gripes I saw about the zippers I would say are more from used error that poor construction. I am an amateur seamstress, the stitching is sound and the zippers are of a good quality. I can see where the inner lining could get caught in the teeth of the zipper,(one of my front pockets on it got stuck briefly) but if you are patient with it, you can get the liner out and not cause the fails I've seen in some of the pics. Over all the bag is well made and very large. The price is a steal for leather in this size and it is really cute.
I absolutely LOVE this purse. Great value for the money. I collect skulls so it fits me perfectly. I definitely recommend buying one.
Thanks you

This has quickly become my favorite purse. I struggle with finding a good purse, but this exceeded my expectations. It does have some small threads that are poking out but I just clipped them. Absolutely great purse and cute design.
Really like the purse. Well made and sturdy but it has a weird smell even after wiping it down. Had to fabreeze it and let it air out fir a week.
Don't buy. After a month of using it broke.  I really liked it but it's made poorly.
